message.body: Hey! How are you getting to prom, like are you driving? If so do u think Sam and I could get a ride with you guys?
Dan and I are getting a ride with max and Sofie...there may be space in their car? Idk text one of them...where are you going for pictures?
Same place as you I think, Casey's? I don't have max or sofies number...
There's a pretty big group going to Casey's I'm sure you'll be able to find a ride there
Eep do u have any suggestions for people to ask?? I'm like totally II if the loop
I just texted some people...I can think of some rides but they're with people who aren't at Casey's..hen
Hmm*
Ill text case and figure it out, Sam drives so well be fine, I just don't want to make him
Could I maybe have softes number to ask?
*oops sofies haha
I actually don't have her number...do you want max's?
Although I already texted him about it and he hasnt responded yet
Ok I'm not great friends with max, so just let me know when he responds (fingers crossed!) I also asked Jenny, ugh the prob is the boys planned!
Sorayray! How do we get max????!! I'm have a panic attack!!!

Don't panic!! Max says he only has room for one more. Do you really thank Sam will mind driving? Rachel Pallmeyer can probably take you if you Dont mind being with peopke you dont know? But she won't be taking pictures with you?
Ugh! Doesn't e have a back seet? I haven't asked Sam, but I really feel bad asking
He says he can't. I'm sure SOMEONE will be able to take you when you go tomorrow
If you wanna just ask there
Well I'm gonna take Kara's trolley if not, so I kinda need to know by tonight, I fb messaged so hopefully SOMEONE will respond, but know body has yet, ugh
Ooh Kara's trolley!! That could be very good!
